page.title: 04NEROCHE C.P. SCHOOL BROADWAY
page.content: Neroche school Broadway got its name from Neroche Forest.At the time of the original Domesday Book the Neroche Forest covered much of the area of south Somerset.Neroche school was built 12 years ago in 1973. The small schools in Horton and Donyatt closed because there weren't enough pupils in them.The pupils all came to this school. They are divided into 4 classes. Class 1 is the Reception class and has 29 children.Class 2 has 32 older infants and lower juniors.Class 3 has 32 lower juniors and class 4 has 34 upper junior children.On Mondays Tuesdays and Thursdays the local playgroup meets in one of the spare classrooms. The school has a field and two playgrounds for Football and Cricket.
